string-array.name: facts
string-array.item: "Em’s in the Guinness Book of World Records for being the fastest selling hip-hop artist."
"One of the Requirements to be signed to Shady Records is you have to battle Eminem"
"Em is of Scottish and Welsh decent.".
"Em has been falsely reported dead by a car crash 4 times and a drug overdose once."
"Eminem is the oldest member of D12 (b. 1972). Kon Artis is the youngest (b. 1978)."
"He is a Spiderman fan."
"Em is a Baptist (just like his mom and the rest of her family). He’s not religious though. Kim’s the one who is Catholic. She’s also not religious."
"Em wears glasses because he’s near-sighted."
"Em’s a gadget freak."
"Em’s favorite porn star is Janet Jacme."
"Kim and Em’s term of endearment is \"Stinky\"."
"Despite what was written before, Em did not attempt suicide. He took pills to fight his depression and accidentally OD’d. He was happy to wake up the next day."
"The platinum bracelet and ring he usually wears both have “DAD” inscribed on them. Both are from Hailie."
"Despite his chosen profession, Em is still a very quiet individual (much like his character Rabbit) which either surprises or annoys the shit out of people."
"Em used to have a problem with people staring at him."
"Em thinks Robin Williams is brilliant and vice versa."
"Em’s all-time favorite movie is The Matrix."
"Em thought Luis Resto was Michael Bolton when he first met him"
"Em had a crush on Madonna when he was 11"
"The first concert he ever went to is Run DMC, Big Daddy Kane and Queen Latifah in Detroit."
"Em cuts his own hair"
"Em’s fave dance song is Busta Rhymes’s \"Put Your Hands Where My Eyes Can See\"."
"Lose Yourself may have topped the poll on songs that spurs ball players to victory but it also topped the poll on songs most likely to lead to car crashes."
"Elton John has dedicated his song Rocket Man to Em."
"Shannon Elizabeth was Em’s first choice to be the girl in \"Superman\"."
"Neil Tennant (Petshop Boys) has a crush on Em and wishes that the events in their song \"The night I fell in love\" would happen to him."
"Em and Hailie has a cat named Tigger."
"For his 8 Mile role, Em dropped from 168 lbs (12 stone or 76.21kg) to 145 lbs (10.35 stone or 65.8kg)."
"Em wears size XXL clothes."
"Marshall Jr. and Debbie were in a band called Daddy Warbucks. They played @ Ramada Inns along the Dakota-Montana border."
"Em prefers Fords. His friends say that he doesn’t like to drive though."
"Em does not smoke."
"Em has adopted Dawn’s (Kim’s twin) daughter, Alaina."
"Dre made Em change (in ‘Love Me’) the line “I’m the equivalent of what will happen if Suge rapped” to \"I’m the equivalent of what will happen if Bush rapped.\"."
"Em’s other celebrity neighbor in his new Oakland hood is Aretha Franklin."
"Em received $3 Million for his 8 Mile role."
"Luis Resto calls Em’s style of production as ‘Classical Hip-Hop’ because of Em’s penchant for using live instruments and minimal sampling."
"Em did all the three verses of Lose Yourself in one take."
"Em called on Craig G (of the original Juice Crew) to co-write with him all the rhymes that was recited on 8 Mile."
"Em’s relatives used to call him Mickey when he was a baby because he had big ears."
"Dr. Dre and Jimmy Iovine were backstage at the Oscars when Em won. They were there for their boy even if Em wasn’t there."
"Eminem’s favorite drink is Mountain Dew."
"It had been Eminem’s dream since he was 16 to sample Aerosmith’s Dream On, his dream came true on the track Sing for the moment."
"Some of Eminem’s favorite movies are How High?, Orange County, and The Matrix."
"Eminem’s 99 purple Mustang 2 was sold online for $27,900."
"Eminem's shoe size is 10 1/2"
"To record ‘97 Bonnie and Clyde Em told Kim he was taking Hailie to Chuck E. Cheese."
"The shady one attends public community meetings and even lets kids in the neighborhood play basketball at his house."
"Eminem’s tattoo artist is Mr. Cartoon, he’s located in California."
"Em used to spend hours at night studying the dictionary so that he could expand his vocabulary for his ryhmes."
"Eminem originally wanted to become a comic-book artist."
"Eminem gave his manager Paul Rosenberg one of the Grammys that he won in 2000"
"The cast Eminem is wearing in Fight Music is due to an injury Em’s sustained whilst trying to fix his house."
"The guy dressed as a cactus that in Purple Hills video is also in the beginning of the Without Me video clip."
"Eminem’s height is 5 foot 8 inches."
"His full name is Marshall Bruce Mathers III."
"His birthday is October 17, 1972."
"Eminem's all time favorite rapper is Tupac Shakur."
"Eminem dropped out of school after failing 9th grade 3 times, mainly because he skipped school too many times to battle kids on the street corners."
"Eminem's major influences growing up were his uncle, Ronnie, the Beastie Boys, LL Cool J, 2 Live Crew, Run DMC, and 3rd Bass."
"Eminem fell in love with rap when she 1st heard Ice-T's \"Reckless\" and started writing rhymes when he was 12 years old."
"Eminem worked for a factory called Gibbs Machinery when he was 16. He had a lot of odd jobs (sweeping floors, taking out the trash) and also worked at Little Ceaser's Pizza."
"Eminem was really quiet at school and had a hard time making friends, but started becoming more social in the 8th grade."
"Eminem used to spend his free time watching TV and reading comic books."
"Eminem was 14 when he wrote his first rap song and he wrote it to LL Cool J's \"I'm Bad\"."
"Eminem started walking at 11 months."
"His dad left him and his mom when Eminem was only 6 months old."
"Eminem has two half brothers: Michael and Nathan."
"Eminem has a half sister named Sarah."
"Eminem's mother is Scandinavian and his father's family is from the South of Wales."
"Dre discovered Eminem after finding his demo tape on the floor of his studio."
"Tom Green and South Park make him laugh like crazy."
"Eminem like shopping at K-Mart, but is mad because he can't go as much because of his fame."
"His greatest fear is a crazed fan will kill him at a concert."
"Although Eminem likes playing basketball, his friends say he can't dribble the ball without traveling."
"Eminem like to keep in touch with his circle of friends who know him as \"Marshall Mathers\"."
"Eminem's mom sued Eminem for $12 million for defamation, settled for $25,000."
"Eminem has a total of 10 tattoos."
